home_description:
My name is Georgiy Shevoroshkin, and I'm a 20-year-old software developer with a passion for creativity and learning. I graduated from the Informatikmittelschule Hottingen and have been working in application development for over 5 years.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring my many interests. I enjoy drawing, making origami, cooking, biking, camping, and playing guitar. I'm also passionate about teaching and have experience tutoring children in maths, English, and coding.
Throughout my career, I've worked on a wide range of projects, from games to web development. I love a challenge and enjoy using my skills to solve complex problems and create innovative solutions.
On this website, you'll find examples of my work, as well as information about my skills and experience. Whether you're a potential employer or just curious about my work, I hope you'll find something that interests you. Thank you for visiting, and please don't hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions or would like to work together!
